means: 简短的，仅可蔽体的，小型的
使简短( abbreviate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It was an abbreviated document without detailed proposals.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一份省去了建议细节的文件简本。

sentence.Network_en: He abbreviated his first name to Alec.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将自己的名字缩写为亚历克。

sentence.Network_en: He abbreviated so much that it was hard to understand his article.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的文章缩写词使用太多,令人费解.

entry.def: If you abbreviate something, especially a word or a piece of writing, you make it shorter.

example.ex: He abbreviated his first name to Alec.
example.tran: 他将自己的名字缩写为亚历克。

sentences.sentence: "her shortened life was clearly the result of smoking"

auth_sentence.content: He recorded only some abbreviated and reworked sections.
auth_sentence.res_content: He recorded only some abbreviated and reworked sections.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He recorded only some abbreviated and reworked sections.

auth_sentence.content: It is usually referred to as Brasenose or abbreviated to BNC.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is usually referred to as Brasenose or abbreviated to BNC.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is usually referred to as Brasenose or abbreviated to BNC.

auth_sentence.content: Bloomfield was serving an abbreviated menu.
